bratColor.metaTitle: Brat Color #8ACE00 - Official Brat Green Color Code
bratColor.metaDescription: Discover the iconic Brat green color. Get HEX #8ACE00, RGB and HSL values for Charlie XCX's Brat album signature color.
bratColor.title: Brat Color
bratColor.subtitle: The iconic green color from Charlie XCX's Brat album
aboutContent: The Brat album by Charlie XCX features a signature bright green color (#8ACE00) that has become instantly recognizable in pop culture.
This vibrant lime green represents the bold, confident, and unapologetic energy of the Brat aesthetic. It's been widely adopted across social media, fan art, and internet culture.
The color is characterized by high saturation and brightness, making it stand out with a rebellious and playful vibe that perfectly captures the album's spirit.
Use these exact color values to create your own Brat-inspired designs and graphics!
